name: Reverse Trashman - Yogscast GameJam
description:
Made with XNA, Paint.NET and CrazyTalk Animator 3.

Sadly, I need to work tomorrow so I don't have more time to work on this..

This is very much not a finished game. I just wanted to see what I could do in 24 hours. Spent way too much time on the art and animations so the coding is a real hackjob. I'd call it more of a prototype or art showcase than a game at the moment.

Game is about "Giving" trash back to their rightful owners.

I had way more stuff planned but the time just isn't there.

If the game doesn't launch: Install the XNA redist.
